title: Assessment of the effect of agro-industrial by-products rich in polyphenols onin vitrofermentation and methane reduction in sheep.
abstract: This study aimed to evaluate, using thein vitrogas production technique, the effect of including eight agro-industrial by-products (carob, grape, two types of olive pomace, citrus pulp, tomato, and hazelnut skin) on fermentation end-products, ruminal degradability, and methane production in sheep diets.
